description: A team of 15 specially trained sniffer dogs has started work at Finland's biggest airport.
title: Coronavirus: Helsinki airport trials sniffer dogs as Covid-19 detectors
title_page: Coronavirus: Helsinki airport trials sniffer dogs as Covid-19 detectors - BBC News
maintext: But while the trial has shown early promise, more research needs to be done to prove the efficiency of canine testing. At the moment, passengers who take part in the trial are also instructed to take a swab to confirm the result.
